Bandits such as these will usually establish a base in the highlands, often on a steep ledge where they have a view of the surrounding countryside. This makes them difficult to surprise. The best way to discover its location would be to find a band of them who appear to be heading back to their base to resupply, and follow their tracks.

Bandits such as these will usually set up their encampments deep in the woods, sometimes in the middle of a swamp. The best way to discover its location would be to find a band of them who appear to be heading back to their base to resupply, and follow their tracks.

Bandits such as these will usually set up their encampments deep in the woods. The best way to discover its location would be to find a group of bandits who appear to be heading back to their base to resupply, and follow them.
É, eu farei isso.
Temo que não possa fazer esse trabalho no momento.
Muito bem. Esperaremos por notícias suas.
Nós ouvimos que {s4}, alguns viajantes na estrada {reg4?de:para} {s5} foram atacados por {s7}.

Gostaríamos que você caçasse esses {s4}. Os comerciantes da cidade conseguiram pegar uma descrição do líder deles, e colocaram uma recompensa em sua cabeça. Se você for bem sucedido e destruí-los, valerá muito a pena para você...
É, eu farei isso.
Muito bem. O bando nem sempre está na área, mas sempre há chance de que outros viajantes os vejam na estrada.
Temo que não possa fazer esse trabalho no momento.
You're looking for a job? Actually, I was looking for someone to deliver some {s4}. Perhaps you can do that...
I have a cargo of {s6} that needs to be delivered to the mead hall in {s4}. If you can take {reg5} units of {s6} to {s4} in 7 days, you may earn {reg8} peningas. What do you say?
Certo. Eu farei a entrega.
Temo que não possa transportar essa carga agora.
You're looking for a job? Actually, I was looking for someone to escort a caravan. Perhaps you can do that...

I am going to send a caravan of goods to {s8}. However, with all those bandits and deserters on the roads, I don't want to send them out without an escort. If you can lead that caravan to {s8} in 15 days, you will earn {reg8} peningas. Of course, your party needs to be at least {reg4} strong to offer them any protection. Also, keep in mind that the caravan may need to travel over the sea to get to its destination. Also ferries and ships hired for transport in port towns will be unable to carry the cargo. So you may need to own a ship to be able to escort it.
Certo. Eu escoltarei a caravana.
Eu temo que não tenha tantos soldados comigo.
Desculpe. Não posso fazer isso agora.
Podemos dar conta do resto do caminho nós mesmos. Obrigado.
Well, we have almost reached {s21}. We can cover the rest of the way ourselves. Here's your pay... {reg14} peningas. Thanks for escorting us. Good luck.
Saudações. Você deve ser nossa escolta, certo?
Sim. Meu nome é {playername}. Vou guiar vocês até {s1}.
Well, it is good to know we won't travel alone. What do you want us to do now?
Eh. Já chegamos tão longe... O que quer que façamos?
Me siga. Vou levar você por uma rota segura.
Certo. Estou logo atrás de você.
Fique aqui por enquanto. Eu vou na frente para checar a estrada.
Certo. Ficaremos esperando por você aqui.

Na verdade, eu procurava por um aventureiro capaz como você. Existe um grupo de bandidos causadores de problemas. Eles infestam a vizinhança de nossa cidade e atacam minhas caravanas. Eles conseguiram evitar os soldados e milícias até agora. Se ninguém conseguir parar eles, logo estarei arruinado...
I will reward you handsomely if you hunt down those troublesome bandits. It's dangerous work. But I believe that you are the {reg59?one:man} for it. What do you say?
Muito bem. Irei acabar com esses bandidos.
Você vai? Esplêndido. Boa sorte para você.
Desculpe. Não tenho tempo para isso agora.

Actually, I was looking for a reliable {reg59?helper:man} that can undertake an important mission. A group of bandits has kidnapped the daughter of a friend of mine and is holding her for ransom. My friend is ready to pay them, but we still need someone to take the money to those rascals and bring the girl back to safety.

The amount the bandits ask as ransom is {reg12} peningas. I will give you that money once you accept to take the quest. You have 15 days to take the money to the bandits who will be waiting near the village of {s4}. Those bastards said that they are going to kill the poor girl if they don't get the money by that time. You will get your pay of {reg8} peningas when you bring the girl safely back here.
All right, I will take the ransom money to the bandits and bring back the girl.

Good. I knew we could trust you at this. Here is the ransom money, {reg12} peningas. Count it before taking it. And please, don't attempt to do anything rash. Keep in mind that the girl's well being is more important than anything else...
Desculpe. Não tenho tempo para isso agora.
Thank you so much for bringing me back! I can't wait to see my family. Farewell.
Sim. Venha comigo. Estamos indo para casa.
Unfortunately, you do not have room in your party for me.
É mesmo? Muito obrigada!
Espere um pouco mais. Irei voltar para buscá-la.
Oh, please {reg59?madam:sir}, do not leave me here all alone!
Oh {reg59?madam:sir}. Thank you so much for rescuing me. Will you take me to my family now?
Sim. Venha comigo. Estamos indo para casa.
Unfortunately, you do not have room in your party for me.
É mesmo? Muito obrigada!
Espere um pouco mais. Irei voltar para buscá-la.
Oh, please {reg59?madam:sir}, do not leave me here all alone!
Posso ir com você agora?
É você que trouxe o resgate? Rápido, nos dê o dinheiro agora.
Você voltou? Rápido, nos dê o dinheiro agora.
Tome o dinheiro. Agora solte a garota.
Heh. Você trouxe o dinheiro, muito bem. Pode ficar com a garota agora. Foi um prazer fazer negócios com você...
De jeito nenhum! Solte a garota primeiro.
Tolo! Pare com esses truques e nos dê o dinheiro!
Certo. Aqui está seu dinheiro. Liberte a garota agora.
Eu deixei o dinheiro em um local seguro. Vou ir lá buscá-lo.
Está testando nossa paciência ou algo assim? Vá e traga o dinheiro rápido.
Eu não tenho intenção de pagar nada a você. Eu exijo que liberte a garota agora!
Você não vai exigir mais nada quando estiver morto.
O que foi? Você nos deu o dinheiro. O negócio acabou.
Desculpe incomodá-lo. Seguirei em meu caminho agora.
Nós temos mais um negócio a fazer. Você vai me devolver o dinheiro agora.
Ah esse negócio! É claro. Vamos a ele.
Oh {reg59?madam:sir}. Thank you so much for rescuing me. Will you take me to my family now?
Sim. Venha comigo. Vou levá-la para casa.
Infelizmente. Não tenho espaço para você em minha companhia.
Oh, muito obrigada!
Espere um pouco mais. Irei voltar para buscá-la.
Oh, please {reg59?madam:sir}, do not leave me here all alone!
Unfortunately, I lost the girl on the way here...
Oh não! Como eu devo contar isso para meu amigo?
Perdoe-me. Não pude fazer nada.
You let me down {playername}. I had trusted you. I will let people know of your incompetence at this task. Also, I want back that {reg8} peningas I gave you as the ransom fee.
É claro. Aqui está...
Pelo menos teve a decência de devolver o dinheiro.
Desculpe. Não tenho esse dinheiro comigo.
Acha que vou acreditar nisso? Você vai pagar isso! Vá e me traga o dinheiro o mais rápido possível.

This war between the {s15} and the {s14} has brought our town to the verge of ruin. Our caravans get raided before they can reach their destination. Our merchants are afraid to leave the safety of the town walls. And as if those aren't enough, the taxes to maintain the war take away the last bits of our savings. If peace does not come soon, we cannot hold on for much longer.
You are right, but who can stop this madness called war?
É seu dever ajudar os nobres nessa guerra. Não deveria estar reclamando.
Hah. Os nobres lutam as guerras deles por causa de sua ganância e seus sonhos de glória. E é o povo pobre e honesto como nós que paga o preço. Mas você não se importa...

Houve tentativas de reconciliar ambos os lados e obter uma trégua. No entanto, lordes poderosos em ambos os lados têm interesse de continuar com a guerra. Esses homens pressionam os outros a não terem cautela ou amolecerem, e sim a continuar lutando. Enquanto esses líderes continuarem influenciando, nenhuma trégua poderá ser feita.
Quem são esses belicistas que bloqueiam o caminho da paz?
Quem são esses lordes de que fala?
They are {s12} from the {s15} and {s13} from the {s14}. Until they change their mind or lose their influence, there will be no chance of having peace between the two sides.
O que pode ser feito quanto a isso?
Infelizmente, parece que nada pode ser feito sobre isso.

Há um modo de resolver esse problema. Uma pessoa determinada poderia talvez persuadir um ou talvez ambos lordes em aceitar a paz. E se isso falhar, pode ser possível derrotar esses lordes em batalha e tomá-los como prisioneiros. Se eles forem cativos, eles perderam a influência e não poderão mais se opor a uma trégua... O que você acha? Pode fazer isso?
It seems difficult, but I will try.
Se o preço for bom, posso até tentar.
Esqueça. Isso não é problema meu.

Most of the merchants in the town will gladly open up their purses to support such a plan. I think we can collect {reg12} peningas between ourselves. We will be happy to reward you with that sum, if you can work this out. Convince {s12} and {s13} to accept a peace settlement, and if either of them proves too stubborn, make sure he falls captive and cannot be ransomed until a peace deal is settled.
All right, I will do my best.
Sorry. I cannot do this.
Excelente. Você tem nossas bênçãos. Espero que seja capaz de lidar com aqueles bodes velhos. Estaremos esperando por boas notícias.
Don't say no right away. Think about this for some time. If there is a {reg59?lady:man} who can manage to do this, it is you.

Do I indeed! There's a group of bandits infesting the town, and I'm at the end of my rope as to how to deal with them. They've been ambushing and robbing townspeople under the cover of night. Then they fade away, quick as lightning, when the guards finally show up. We've not been able to catch a one of them. They only attack lone people, never daring to show themselves when there's a group about. I need someone who can take on these bandits alone and win. That seems to be the only way of bringing them to justice. Are you up to the task?

There's a group of bandits infesting the town, and I'm at the end of my rope as to how to deal with them. They've been ambushing and robbing townspeople under the cover of night. Then they fade away, quick as lightning, when the guards finally show up. We've not been able to catch a one of them. They only attack lone people, never daring to show themselves when there's a group about. I need someone who can take on these bandits alone and win. That seems to be the only way of bringing them to justice. Are you up to the task?
Matar bandidos? Mas é claro!
Desculpe, mas não estou interessado.
Isso tira um peso de meus ombros, {playername}. Você pode esperar uma boa recompensa se tiver êxito. Apenas não vá ser morto, certo?
One of the merchants here is looking for herdsmen to take his cattle to the market in {s13}.

The cattle herd must be at {s13} within 30 days. Sooner is better, much better, but it must be absolutely no later than 30 days. If you can do that, I'd be willing to pay you {reg8} peningas for your trouble. Interested?
Sim, posso levar o rebanho até {s13}.
Não, desculpe.
Splendid. You can find the herd right outside the town. After you take the animals to {s13}, come back to me and you will get your pay.
No problem. I will bring your {s13} back.
Não, desculpe.
Aye, I will bring you {reg33} loads of {s33}.
Não, desculpe.
Splendid. Good luck on finding the rascal and bringing my {s13} back.
Splendid. Good luck on finding the rascal and bringing my {s13} back.
Splendid. Bring {reg33} loads of {s33} here, and I will reimburse you for your expenses.
Splendid. Bring {reg33} loads of {s33} here, and I will reimburse you for your expenses.
Temo que não possa oferecer um trabalho para você agora.
Temo que não possa oferecer um trabalho para você agora.
My good {reg59?madam:sir}. Our village is grateful for your help. Thanks to the {reg5} head of cattle you have brought, we can now raise our own herd.
My good {reg59?madam:sir}. Our village is grateful for your help. The slave will be punished now.
My good {reg59?madam:sir}. You tried, but you returned without the slave. I guess you couldn't find him...
My good {reg59?lady:lord}, please, is there anything I can do for you?
I do not think we can get more information. It seems that your fate, your Wyrd, takes you to Danmark, my friend.
{playername}, the prisoner is waiting to be interrogated. He may have some information.
Wyrd bith ful araed!
{playername}, you are here! Thank God! Viking ships are coming! It's Sven Bull Neck! He wants to destroy us.
Sorry, {reg59?my lady:man}. It is late, and I have to be back at home. I will see you with the new day.

Welcome to {s9}... Oh, wait! You are the {reg59?lady:man} we found in the sea! Nice to see you, most assuredly! I didn't dare hope to see you alive again. That healer may yet prove worthy of the legacy of his father, God rest his soul!
Are you Thonkrik? My name is {playername}, and I am in debt to Doccinga.
Thonkrik from Doccinga? I am {playername}. I have some questions.

That isn't necessary. No debt, my friend! Rescuing others from distress at sea is the duty of every fisherman! ^We found you unconscious, clinging to a plank and led by the tide. Fortunately, you were not far from the coast.
Well, {playername}, go ahead.
We were traveling on a ship, the Woden Ric, and were attacked by Vikings! That's the reason you found me in the sea.

I know the Woden Ric! It made landfall at Doccinga many times, because it had passengers seeking cures for the most terrible ills. ^The father of the healer who has healed you was a man well known for his skills in many parts, and thousands of people left everything to come here. Now that man has died, and unfortunately his son does not have his father's magic. ^I am sorry to hear that the Woden Ric was attacked by Vikings...
I was one of those people. My mother was sick, and now, maybe she... is dead.
My mother traveled with me. Did you find other people or... corpses where you found me?
The sea brings swollen corpses and wrecks to our shores sometimes, but nobody lately. Usually, Vikings take prisoners to sell as slaves...
Thonkrik, our ship was attacked by Sven Bull Neck. Have you heard of this name before?

{s1}^^Sven Bull Neck? Oh, my good God! It is a miracle then that you are alive. Sven is a murderer, and his men are demons. He takes no prisoners, kills the whole crew, and burns the ship with the corpses inside. ^He does not look for riches. Sven is more ambitious. Each year we pay a lot of money to him to leave us in peace.
He killed my mother, so now I'll kill him! Tell me, where I can find Sven?
My mother may have been doomed regardless, but he'll pay for attacking ME! Where is Sven?

{s3}^^To seek Sven? Are you crazy? You are not listening to me! Look around? See those men training here? They are hardened warriors, sent by our jarl! They are here to defend us from Sven's attacks. And we are lucky! Other villages don't enjoy as much importance to the jarl. ^No, no, I know nothing about Sven!
And so what? They are not looking for Sven. Where is Sven? I want an answer now!
Thonkrik, I need your help. Don't you know I can help you kill Sven?

I don't have an answer for you. I am but a simple villager who yet, I may point out, retains his head. If you are so intent on your own destruction, you should ask the jarl of Kennemer. God has given you a second chance, saving your life, but now you intend to waste it. Good luck, but I cannot help more.
Thanks for everything.

{s1}^^{playername}, look at yourself! You are weak, puny! Almost dead just weeks ago saved by lowly fishermen. You've lost all your possessions. You don't have weapons, resources or men. I don't know where Sven keeps his hideout, but if you go there someday, you will meet your death.
I don't fear death, Thonkrik. I know what I want to do, and it is to kill Sven. Farewell!
I see you don't know anything. Thanks for everything. Farewell.

I see the determination in your eyes. Here, take these few coins and my advice along with them: find a job and forget about Sven. Otherwise, feel free to ask the jarl of Kennemer, he might be able to help you.
You are right. I don't know anything, but you can ask the jarl of Kennemer. Please take some food. You have a long journey ahead of you.
Calm down, Thonkrik! I'm here to help.
The young people of the village have gathered on the beach with the king's troops to try to prevent the landing of Sven Bull Neck, but they are few. Thanks for coming to our aid!
Finally, Sven is near. He will pay greatly for what he did to me.
Where are the men of {s4}?
{s2}^^Those boats are Sven's, that's for sure. He always leads them. But this many men... I've never heard of Sven Bull Neck attacking a village with so many. It looks like an invasion!

{s4} will not come, I know. Some of the people here sent messengers, too, like you and the king, but he did not respond.^^Normally, I would not talk about this openly, for they are Danish problems, but {s4} has left my people to their fate. In fact, I fear that all this is because of him.

{s2}^^I know people who work in the jarl's house, and it is rumored that he aspires to the throne of Friese... I should not say this, but Sven Bull Neck has been there in the past.^I fear that these boats are attacking Doccinga to bring Sven's warriors to help the jarl capture the throne, but these are just my assumptions.
Damn traitor. He's been playing with me.
I'll take care of that issue later. Right now, I have to stop an invasion.
Be careful with him, he is a dangerous man.
Ic bancie the! Thank you for coming to help, {playername}. I will join my people now. A huskarl from the king leads the defense.
Follow his orders. Please fight with us! Good luck.
What you want to do with the prisoner?
Kill him! He is a murderer and does not deserve to live.
Free him. I don't want his blood to weigh on our hands.
It will be done as you have said. As for you, what will you do now?

In Friese, I'm not wanted. I've earned powerful enemies against whom I cannot fight now, Thonkrik. My priority is my mother. I must save her. I will try finding passage to Danmark on some ship and looking for Sven Bull Neck. Maybe we will never meet again...
I know you'll be back someday...
Yes, with an army. The jarls and the king of Friese will pay for what they have done to me.
No, I hate this land. You will not see me again.
It is possible. If I return, I will stop in Doccinga to say hello, friend.
I understand it. You're a {reg59?woman:man} haunted by revenge: Sven, Sigurd, and now the jarl of Kennemer. I hope you find peace someday.
Then, may fate accept that someday you will make your way back.
So I hope! The people of Doccinga love and admire you. Here you will always find a bed to sleep on and fire to warm up by.
Now, I need to find a boat that is traveling to Ribe...

I can help you with that. One of the Sven's boats was left behind relatively undamaged and has been repaired in secret. It is our gift to you for saving us. The ship awaits you at a beach near Doccinga... and also someone else is waiting for you there. I have a favor to ask, {playername}.

You remember I told you that someone was in the house of the jarl of Kennemer? Someone passing me information? Well that person is my daughter. The jarl snatched her to serve in his house as a maid for his wife. She managed to escape from Kennemer, and now I want you to take her along. If the jarl finds her, he'd take her back to his house, or maybe he would kill her. I need you to do this for me, {playername}, and the boat is yours.
I'll take her with me and will protect her.
No. Where I'm going is no place for a girl. I cannot protect her. She should stay here.

Do not make me beg, my friend. Do you think you have several ships to choose from? There is no other mode of transportation for you. With Sven's attacks, merchants take weeks to come back here. You don't know what they did to my daughter in Kennemer, {playername}... I do not want her warming again the bed of any of the jarl's men. Sorry, but there is no choice: the ship and my daughter go together.
Well, I'll take her and the ship. Farewell, Thonkrik.
Wes gesund, my friend.
Wes gesund.
Good day, {reg59?madam:sir}, and welcome to {s9}. I am the leader of this village.

Welcome to {s9}, my {reg59?lady:lord}. We were rejoiced by the news that you are the new {reg59?lady:lord} of our humble village. I am the village elder and I will be honoured to serve you in any way I can.
{reg59?My lady:My lord}, you honour our humble village with your presence.{s33}
Good day, {reg59?madam:sir}, and welcome to {s9}. I am the local leader of this village.
Good day. I am happy to see you back.
Good day, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Há alguma coisa que pode fazer por você?
Sure, Thonkrik. Take me to him. It is time for some words.
Siga-me.
I am looking for someone who may or may not be a ghost.
A ghost? Hah! Ghosts don't appear during the day! Try finding him at night!
A ghost? Ghosts don't appear on their own! You need to walk by him to wake him up.
Have you seen any {s22}-playing guards around here?
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}, but I doubt you'll run into him at this hour of the night. You would have better luck during the day.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. Haven't heard or seen anyone like that, but if he is hiding here, you might be able to find him if you look around.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. I have heard some sweet sounds of a {s22} lately, but don't know if... hmm... You are welcome to look around.
Caliacas? The abbot of Finian sent me.
Caliacas? Is everything well? We received your message.
Your village is safe. You will not have more problems with Morrigan.

Ah, the abbot is a good man to respond to our call so promptly! I asked him for three heroes, and in fact, three heroes have come! You are the last to arrive, so you are the most anticipated, since the evil that has befallen our land is terrible indeed. Many have died, others have fled, and the few that remain can hardly keep their sanity.
Stop! Three heroes? What do you mean?
Three heroes? You do not need so many. You have me. Dismiss them.

The evil that afflicts us is magical, so we must fight it with magic. Three is the number of the old gods, so the old man said three should be the number of heroes. Any other number will fail and die. At first, we did not believe him, you understand. We are Christians, and our priest said the old man was a pagan and should be burned, and that's what we did. But we were idiots. The old gods are still here, and they want revenge. Now the old man is dead and cannot aid us more, and our priest has disappeared.
You burned the poor old man? You deserve what you're going through!
No doubt, that old man had something to do with this. Better to solve this without him.
What else did this old man say?

Do our women and children also deserve this? And that old man was not poor. He prayed to demons, performed rituals, and sacrificed animals. He lived in a hut from which he sold potions and ointments. Many believe that it was because of him that all this evil is happening to us. That he invoked something... Therefore, when our priest ordered us to burn the old man, we locked him up in his hut and burned it to the ground, listening all the while to his screams and curses.

We should not have burned him. That old man was powerful. He prayed to demons, performed rituals, and sacrificed animals. He lived in a hut from which he sold potions and ointments. Many believe that it was because of him that all this evil is happening to us. That he invoked something... Therefore, when our priest ordered us to burn the old man, we locked him up in his hut and burned it to the ground, listening all the while to his screams and curses. The only advice he left us was that we should bring three heroes, or the evil that lurks around us will end up destroying us.

That old man was powerful. He prayed to demons, performed rituals, and sacrificed animals. He lived in a hut from which he sold potions and ointments. Many believe that it was because of him that all this evil is happening to us. That he invoked something... Before our priest ordered us to burn him, he told us that we should bring three heroes, or the evil that lurks around us will end up destroying us.
You were right to call three heroes then.
What evil is attacking you?
Yes, I think it was the right thing to do. I'm also glad that the abbot respected my reasons, for anyone might have thought us to be heretics.

A month or so ago, a shepherd disappeared. A few days later, we found his dismembered body near an old tree. That scared us, because an animal would never do that to a man. After that, nobody left the village without a companion, but that did not help. A few days later, a group of people was attacked. Women and children disappeared, and we later found them dismembered.

--His hands tremble as he speaks.--^^Then we hired a group of Norsemen for a lot of money, but evil did the same to them as to our people, and their dismembered bodies were soon food for the crows.^^Then the old man told us to invite three heroes. Then we burned him.
Did you ask your lord for help?
You talk about evil. Why suspect the supernatural?

--He sighs heavily.--^^Yes, that was the first thing we did. He sent a group of twenty warriors. They were found dead and dismembered a few days later. Now our lord says he cannot send more men. He needs them for his wars. Since he had left us to our own devices, we asked the abbot.

The old gods are back, thirsty for blood after so many centuries.^^They have not only killed people and warriors, but we have seen them watching the village from afar. They announce they are coming for us. One of these days, the fog will fall, and then we all will die.
When there is fog, we can hear their singing and the howl of their wolves. We can even see their figures between dark wisps of fog. The creatures are huge. Well, all except her.
Her? A woman?
(Dizer nada)
No, not a woman, she is something else... The ancient gods have sent her to kill us all.
--He lowers his voice to a whisper.--^^She is Morrigan, the Phantom Queen, the pagan goddess of battle and... carnal encounters. She was worshipped before Saint Patrick brought us the word of Christ.
A shield-maiden?
(Dizer nada)
What! Please speak lower. Morrigan might hear us. No, she is powerful through magic rather than through physical strength.

My grandfather told me stories about her. The Raven Goddess selects who is going to be slain and takes the blood from their hearts, along with their valor. When they arrive on the battlefield, they are already doomed.^^She appears as a beautiful dark haired woman or sometimes as a crow. A beautiful maiden dressed with a hooded cloak, my grandfather said. She is usually to be found by a river, washing the clothes of men about to die. Centuries ago, she was one of the Tuatha De Danann, the demons that ruled the island before the Gaels arrived. Now she lives in Sidhe, the Underworld, whose entry is the ancient mounds.
She has left Sidhe and has brought her beasts with her. She will destroy us unless some hero defeats her and sends her back to her world.
I am that hero. Where might I find her?
I do not believe in this Morrigan, but I'll put an end to the murderers of your people.
She can't be defeated by one hero, so three were summoned. You should find them first.

The fog always comes from the coast, and with it come Morrigan and her beasts. You have to go there if you want to find her. The other two heroes await you near the burned hut of the old man, a few hours away from this village. They are looking for more clues as they await you. Be warned! When you leave this village and move towards the coast, be alert and flee from the fog, as Morrigan and her animals could catch you before the three of you are joined.
I pray Morrigan attacks me, so I get my reward sooner.
I will be alert, thank you. Farewell, then.
I'm glad to see you alive. Where are the other champions? I hope they are well. After you had left, we saw go behind you the beasts of Morrigan, and we feared the worst!
Yes, everybody is fine. You called me back for this?
Morrigan attacked me, but I am fine, and the other champions, too.

Err, yes, sorry. I sent the messenger to warn you of the danger. Since you are all well, I guess he succeeded in his mission. My intention was not to cause you to come here, but I understand how you might have interpreted it that way.
That's what I thought. Morrigan wanted to take you by surprise. We saw his wolves and bears following in your steps, and a brave lad volunteered to go to the hut of the old pagan to warn you.
Well, the other champions will send me notice of where Morrigan's camp is.
I lost some men in the battle with Morrigan. I need warriors.
I'll wait here for the messenger with news about Morrigan's lair. Send mead and women to my quarters.

In that case, {playername}, you're free to roam the village. Relax here or go hunting nearby, but beware of the fog. We have prepared the big house for you and your men, may its previous occupants rest in peace.

My {reg59?lady:lord}, many of our young people want to fight to avenge what happened. I do not like sending them to their deaths, but I could allow some to join you. Just promise me you'll take care of them, because they are heedless and impulsive.
My {reg59?lady:lord}, many of our young people want to fight to avenge what happened. However, I would be sending them to their deaths, as they are heedless and impulsive. Sorry.

It will be done, my {reg59?lady:lord}. The large house is for you and your men, may its previous occupants rest in peace. I will send our best food and mead. Our young girls will serve you and keep you company. It's the least we can do for our saviors. You are free to roam the village or go hunting nearby, but beware of the fog.

The large house is for you and your men, may its previous occupants rest in peace. I will send our food and mead, but excuse me, my {reg59?lady:lord} -- we prefer to keep our young girls far from your men, as is proper. You are free to roam the village or go hunting nearby, but beware of the fog.
Sure. I will take good care of them.
Then it would be better to leave those boys with their mothers.
I can think of {reg5} youths whom I suspect would join you. Does that suit you?
Any you can spare are welcome.
No, they please me not.

In that case, {playername}, you're free to roam the village. Relax here or go hunting nearby, but beware of the fog. We have prepared the big house for you and your men, may its previous occupants rest in peace.
Thank you for your hospitality, Caliacas. We will wait here until we receive information on where Morrigan's lair is. Then we will finish her off and bring peace back to your people.

--His face shows a disproportionate joy. He seems barely able to keep himself from hugging you.--^^You... you are a hero, my friend! You saved this village, and we will be eternally grateful.^Everyone in this village knows what you have done. You will always be welcome here as a hero. I also give you one of my children, the youngest, to join your army and serve under your name. His name is Bran, and he is very dear to me.
Thanks, Caliacas. I will take good care of him.
That's not necessary. I can't guarantee his safety.
You have saved many lives here. Thanks, {playername}! Return to the abbot of Finian. I'm sure he is ready to reward you and hear the good news. Good luck, my friend.
Sorry, but the decision is taken. I am not a rich man, but my children are strong and healthy, and I find no better way to reward you for what you've done.
I am looking for a man by the name of {s4}. I was told he might be hiding here.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}, but I doubt you'll run into him at this hour of the night. You would have better luck during the day.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. If he is hiding here, you will surely find him if you look around.
Sobre a tarefa que me pediu...
Posso ajudá-lo com alguma tarefa?
I want to buy some supplies. I will pay with silver.
I need to raise the levy.
Very well. We can raise {reg33} people. Do you want to proceed? Please, keep in mind that taking men away from the fields will negatively impact our village.
Hmm, no, I don't want to do that.
Yes, please call up all the eligible men. And get your gear, too.
As you wish, {playername}.
Yes, my {reg59?lady:lord}?
Eu tenho uma nova tarefa para você.
What would you like us to do?
Siga-me.
É claro.
I don't require your services any longer...
Thank you. We'll be happy to go back home.
I would like to set a new tax rate for this fort.
[Sair]
Certainly. What taxes do you want us to pay you?
I would like to set a low tax rate.
I would like to set a high tax rate.
I would like to set a normal tax rate.
Actually, I changed my mind.
Most certainly. We shall abide by your most gracious order.
I would like to set a new tax rate for this village.
Certainly. What taxes do you want us to pay you?
I would like to set a low tax rate.
I would like to set a high tax rate.
I would like to set a normal tax rate.
Actually, I changed my mind.
Most certainly. We shall abide by your most gracious order.
Deixa para lá.
Of course, {reg59?madam:sir}. Do you want to buy goods or cattle?
Quero comprar comida e suprimentos.
We have some food and other supplies in our storehouse. Come and have a look.
Quero comprar gado.
I have {reg25} head of cattle that I would like to gift to your village.
Yes, definitely. Our people will be extremely grateful for such a generous gift.
Mudei de ideia. Não quero comprar coisa alguma.
Você viu algum inimigo por aqui recentemente?
I am sorry, {reg59?madam:sir}. We have neither seen nor heard of any war parties in this area.
Hmm. Vou deixe-me pensar sobre isso.
No, {reg59?madam:sir}. We haven't seen any war parties in this area for some time.
Bem, acho que isso era tudo.

My {reg59?lady:lord}, I can beat and torture your enemies for your pleasure or if you want to make an enemy lord do something. For example, you can force an enemy lord to grant permission to court his daughter or sister, if such permission is hard to gain for you by any other means. Or you can force the lord to grant you parts of his rents from his fief for some time in exchange for freedom. If the lord is pagan and married, you can try to force him to divorce his wife. Then, of course, you will be free to pursue her as a free woman.
Thank you. That was informative.
My {reg59?lady:lord}, what can I do for you?
Torturer? What is it you can do?
I'd like you to have a little chat with one of the prisoners.
Nothing, I'm just checking the prison out.
Whom do you want me to talk to?
Deixa para lá.
Alright, what do you want me to do with {s10}?
Dump that bucket of water on him. Maybe then he'll come back to life.
I'd like you to hit his face, but be careful. He hasn't been ransomed yet.
Just beat him up... a little bit, but be gentle.
Warm up that iron rod. Let's see how well he can handle the heat.
Deixa para lá.
Very well, I will do that.
Very well, I will do that.
Very well, I will do that.
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!!!!!
Whoooosh!!!!!!!!
Looks like he's alive, but he needs to recover a little bit for further conversations.
Looks like that one fell short. Shall we try something else?
Mais alguma coisa?
I think the prisoner has passed out.
Eu preciso que vocês façam uma grande fogueira perto dessa vila.
We have already agreed upon this, {reg59?my lady:sir}. I will do my best. You can trust me.
A fire, {reg59?madam:sir}! Fires are dangerous! Why would you want such a thing?
I believe that we have already discussed this issue, {reg59?my lady:sir}.
We talked about this before, {reg59?madam:sir}. Your previous offers were low compared to risk you want me to take.
Eu tenho meus motivos, e você tem os seus -- uma bolsa de prata. Fará isso, ou não?
Devido ao risco que você corre, você deve saber os meus motivos.
Eu desejo resgatar um prisioneiro de {s4}. Quando começar o incêndio, os guardas em {s4} verão a fumaça, e alguns deles virão até aqui ou baixarão a guarda para ver o que está acontecendo.
As you wish, {reg59?my lady:sir}. You have been a good friend to this village, and, even though there is a risk, we should be glad to return the favor. When do you want this fire to start?
I'm sorry, {reg59?my lady:sir}. You will forgive me for saying this, but we don't exactly have good reason to trust you. This is too dangerous.
As you say, {reg59?my lady:sir}, but in doing this, we are taking a very great risk. What's in it for us?
I can give you 100 peningas.
I can give you 200 peningas.
I can give you 300 peningas.
Deixa para lá.
Isso é loucura. Não posso correr tal risco.
Then let's increase your reward to 200 peningas.
Then let's increase your reward to 300 peningas.
Then let's increase your reward to 300 peningas. This is my last offer.
Deixa para lá.
Muito bem. Você está me pedindo para correr um grande risco, mas farei isso. Quando quer que esse incêndio comece?
I cannot do such a dangerous thing for 200 peningas.
Continue com suas preparações. Daqui a uma hora, eu precisarei do incêndio.
Faça isso na badalada da meia-noite. Eu esperarei exatamente uma hora.
Very well, {reg59?my lady:sir}. We will make our preparations. Now you make yours.
As you wish, {reg59?my lady:sir}. May the heavens protect you.
I'm looking for men who are willing to follow me. I am recruiting...
I can protect this village from harm -- for a fee.
Ach, not another one! For the sake of our families, I will pay your fee.
You have done well. Your families will thank you.
Hah, you joker, you... You don't fool me one bit!
Are there any stray dogs here?
Yes, recently I saw a stray dog. He was begging for food, but nobody here needs a new dog. I think he is currently sitting somewhere around here.
No, I haven't seen any stray dog here recently.
[Sair]
We have {reg5} head of cattle, each for {reg6} peningas. How many do you want to buy?
I am afraid we have no cattle left in the village, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Um.
Dois.
Quatro.
Cinco.
Six.
Seven.
Eight.
Esqueça.
I will tell the herders to round up the animals and bring them to you, {reg59?madam:sir}. I am sure you will be satisfied with your purchase.
Forget it! Why would I help an enemy of the kingdom?
Forget it! In this community, you are not welcome.
Sure. You are welcome!
You do not look like anyone special. A wanderer like many others, with promises and words, but nothing more. Why should I help you find recruits?
I know you're someone feared. I'm not sure many men would want to join you.
What I can say...
I'll take some men that might be nothing but trouble and you would even get paid for that.
You know my reputation. Avoid damage to your people. Give me permission.
Take these 300 peningas for any inconvenience I may have caused.
I see I did not come at a good time. We'll talk again another day. Farewell.
Let's get down to business. Now, listen carefully.
I think this conversation is over. Farewell.
Your silver is music to my ears. Now, let us talk.
I am an honest person. Do you think I'll take your bribe? This conversation is over. Farewell.
Yes, I have heard of your iniquity and what you do against people. Let's see...

My influence here is vast. Many listen to what I say and do what I suggest. I will not allow you to take men who work the land, but there are others... landless losers that contribute nothing more than misery to the community. I could ask them to join you, but you don't look like much of a leader to follow. You will likely take them to their deaths, and they will never return. Surely, even people like them don't deserve such a fate.
Of course, your time and help will be rewarded.
I see what you trying to say, old man. Here, take these 500 peningas.
I think I did not come at a good time. Let us talk some other day. Farewell.
Of course, let's talk about that now.
It doesn't make sense to discuss things that are so vague. I think that I've been wasting my time with you. Farewell.

Well, you have my permission to take those troublemakers off my hands. I think they are eager for adventure anyway. You may go to the center of the village and take anyone loitering there. For every recruit you take from this village, I'll take a commission.
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}, have you made any progress on it?
Indeed. I brought you {reg5} sacks of grain.

My good {reg59?lady:lord}. You have saved us from hunger and desperation. We cannot thank you enough, but you'll always be in our prayers. The village of {s13} will not forget what you have done for us.
My good {reg59?lady:lord}, please, is there anything I can do for you?
Ainda estou trabalhando nisso.
Temo que não poderei dar cabo desta tarefa.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. We are praying for your success every day.
Ah, I am sorry to hear that, {reg59?madam:sir}. I'll try to think of something else.
Well, {reg59?her:his} Highness is already engaged with a task helping us. We cannot ask more from you.
No, {reg59?madam:sir}. We don't have any other tasks for you.
Uma tarefa?

{reg59?My good lady:My good lord}, our village has been going through such hardships lately. The harvest has been bad, and recently some merciless bandits took away our wheat that we had reserved for the planting season. If we cannot find some seed soon, we will not be able to plant our fields and then we will have nothing to eat for the coming year. If you can help us, we would be indebted to you forever.
Hmmm. Quantos grãos vocês precisam?
Não estou a fim disso. Pergunte a outra pessoa.
I think {reg5} packs of grain will let us start the planting. I hope that we can find charitable people to help us with the rest.
Então irei achar os grãos que precisa.
Temo que não tenha tempo para isso. Vai ter que achar ajuda em outro lugar.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. We'll be praying for you night and day.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}, of course. I am sorry if I have bothered you with our troubles.

{reg59?My good lady:My good lord}, we have a bit of a problem on our hands. Although the harvest was good, and we are not doing that badly either, too many of our men can't marry, because there are not enough women in our village, only God knows why. That brings about unnecessary tension among our men, and with it all kind of rowdy behavior and incessant fistfights. You look like a {reg59?lady:man} of the sword. Would you be able to capture and bring us some young women so our poor men can stop fighting and start farming?
I am not a kidnapper. Ask someone else to help you.
Yes, {reg59?my lady:my lord}, of course. I am sorry if I have bothered you with our troubles.
I'm not sure how common this is... Why not ask your lord to help you?
That sounds fascinating. Perhaps I will take you up on that offer when I'm ready...
You seem to know a lot about women, my good man. This all seems so logical now.
I have to admit I'm really excited about undertaking this mission.
Perhaps we should, I can smell a good reward coming my way.
Would you consider taking some of my women warriors instead?
Há alguma recompensa?
I have to admit that you make a lot of sense.
Your men lack willpower, but they're lowly peasants after all...
Sorry, but you have failed to convince me.
Well, we will highly appreciate your {reg59?Ladyship's:Lordship's} helping us. What kind of reward do you have in mind?
I am glad that you can be made to see reason. Your {reg59?Ladyship's:Lordship's} help will be most appreciated, of course.
Yes, my {reg59?lady:lord}, these men are weak. They're chock full of temptations. Wouldn't it make sense for you to help them be at peace with themselves? Your help, of course, will be appreciated.

I apologize, my {reg59?lady:lord}, but my men hardly need spear-wielding warrior wives. They need women who can work the fields and take care of the animals, not pull a knife out when an argument arises.

Well, your {reg59?Ladyship:Lordship} could possibly understand how asking our lord to help us in a delicate matter such this could be dangerous for one's well-being. You, on the other hand, are an outsider, and your aid will be rewarded.
Your {reg59?Ladyship:Lordship} will always be welcome in our village, especially if he helps us with this delicate problem. I assure you, our gratitude is not limited just to this invitation.

My {reg59?lady:lord}, I'm old and have seen and heard a lot of things. I can definitely see the way the world works. Women play a very important role in men's lives, inspiring and guiding them. If you can help us with our little problem, we will find a way to show our gratitude.

Yes, my {reg59?lady:lord}, you really should be excited. Judging from the sparkles in your eyes, you are really up to this little challenge, aren't you? We are, too, your Highness, as it will relieve our men of their anxiety. Your help, of course, will be duly appreciated.
My {reg59?lady's:lord's} intuition is second to none. What kind of reward can you smell?
Cash, my good man. {reg25} of it, give or take.
Perhaps you're right. What's in it for me?
I'm sure my efforts will be appreciated, but I'd like something more tangible, like cash.
Yes, I will help you, but I would require something more tangible than appreciation.
Sorry, but you failed to convince me.
Oh, I see. {reg59?Her ladyship:His lordship} desires coins. How many would {reg59?she:he} like?
I think {reg25} peningas would suffice.
I think we can settle on {reg25} peningas.
I think you misunderstood me. I don't need your money. How many women do you need?
{reg25} peningas - I think your village can handle this amount.
Hmmm, alright, {reg25} peningas will do. How many women do you need?
Hmmm, {reg25} peningas is far too little. I have better things to do. Good day.
I think {reg5} women will be enough for now.
Then I will go and find you the women you need.
Temo que não tenha tempo para isso. Vai ter que achar ajuda em outro lugar.
Thank you, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. May your paths guide you to the best women.
Indeed. I have brought you {reg5} women, as you requested.

My good {reg59?lady:lord}, you are a true savior for our village. We cannot thank you enough, but you'll always be in our prayers. The men of {s13} will not forget what you have done for us. We will all name our first {reg59?daughter:son} after you!
My good {reg59?lady:lord}, please, is there anything I can do for you?

One of our slaves has overwhelmed his owner and fled. You look like a {reg59?woman:man} of war strong enough to capture him. Would you be able to find him and bring him back? He cannot have gone far. He must be hiding somewhere next to the village.
I will find him and bring him back.
I'm no slave hunter.
I am afraid I don't have time for this now.
You will? Oh, splendid! Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. He must be hiding somewhere near our village.
Yes, of course {reg59?madam:sir}. Well, we will find someone else for the job.
Greetings, traveller.
Greetings. What are you doing here in the middle of nowhere?
I ran away from a nearby village, and I'm hiding here trying to decide what to do next.
Anything else you want to know?
Why did you run away?
My master has beaten me on more than one occasion. I could not stand it any longer.
I'm here to bring you back to your master.
I'm begging you, {reg59?madam:sir}. Anything but that. Death awaits me there.
I care very little about your destiny. Follow me!
If death is awaiting you anyway, I will kill you right here.
In that case, I will defend myself.
Join my war band, and you won't have to go back to your master.
Then leave now. I will pretend I haven't seen you.
Thank you so much, {reg59?madam:sir}!

Estamos sofrendo muito nas mãos de um grupo de bandidos. Eles pegam nossa comida e nosso gado, e matam qualquer um que não os obedecem. Nossos homens estão furiosos porque não somos capazes de nos defendermos, mas... somos simples camponeses. Contudo, com alguma ajuda, acho que algumas pessoas aqui podem ser melhores que isso. Precisamos apenas que um guerreiro experiente nos ensine como lutar.
Eu posso ensiná-lo a como se defender.
Vocês camponeses não deviam pegar em armas. Apenas paguem os bandidos e é isso.

You will? Oh, splendid! We would be deeply indebted to you, {reg59?madam:sir}. I'll instruct the village folk to assemble here and receive your training. If you can teach us how to defend ourselves, I promise you'll receive everything we can give you in return for your efforts.
Yes, of course {reg59?madam:sir}. Thank you for your counsel.
Bandits have driven away our cattle. Our pastures are empty. If we had just a few head of cattle, we could start to raise a herd again.
Quantos animais precisa?
Não tenho tempo para isso. Pergunte a outra pessoa.
I think {reg5} head of cattle will suffice for a small herd.
Então irei trazer o gado que precisa.
Temo que não tenha tempo para isso. Vai ter que achar ajuda em outro lugar.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. We'll be praying for you night and day.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}, of course. I am sorry to have bothered you with our troubles.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}, but we do not really need anything right now.
{reg59?My lady:My lord}, you honour my humble shop with your presence.
Welcome {reg59?madam:sir}. What can I do for you?
Mais alguma coisa?
Hogni, the port master of Ribe sends these furs to you.
Finally! I spent weeks waiting for this delivery. Thanks, but do not expect a tip. It has come very late.
A man sent me to see you. His name is Reginhard.
I know who Reginhard is, and it is not a name that it pleases me to hear. I have no time for people coming from him.
Wait! I just want to make a donation to the widows and orphans in this town.
{s2}^^Err, I do not expect this from Reginhard. How much is your donation? We accept 100, 300 and 600 peningas.
These children deserve a better future. Donate 600 peningas.
I think 300 peningas will allow many families to get through the next winter.
I will donate 100 peningas.
I do not have enough money to make a good donation. I will come back later.
{s2}^^Many people will be grateful to you and Reginhard. God bless you.
Quero comprar alguns itens... e talvez vender alguns.
Claro, claro... Aqui, dê uma olhada em meu estoque...
Mais alguma coisa?
Que bens devo comprar aqui para negociar em outras cidades?
Nada. Obrigado.

That information can be best obtained from caravan masters and travelling merchants. If you want, I can send you to the district where foreign merchants stay at when they come to the town. If you spend some time there and listen to the talk, you can learn a lot about what to buy and where to sell it.
Então eu vou ficar um tempo com esses comerciantes.
Não tenho tempo para isso agora.
Good day, friend. If you've come to watch the tournaments, you've come in vain. There won't be a tournament here any time soon.
Torneios? Então torneios acontencem por aqui...

Yes. You should see this place during one of the tournament fights. Everyone from the town and nearby villages comes here. The crowd becomes mad with excitement. Anyway, as I said, there won't be an event here soon, so there isn't much to see. Except, there is an official duel every now and then, and of course we have melee fights almost every day.
Conte mais sobre as lutas corporais.

Os lutadores e cavaleiros ficam entediados esperando pelo próximo torneio, então eles inventaram o treinamento de luta. É uma ideia simples, na verdade. Os lutadores entram na arena com uma arma. Sem regras, sem times. Todo mundo batendo em todo mundo até que sobre apenas um lutador. Parece divertido, não é?
Há alguma recompensa?

There is, actually. Some of the wealthy townsmen offer prizes for those fighters who show great skill in the fights. If you can beat {reg1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {reg11} peningas. You'll get {reg12} peningas for striking down at least {reg2} opponents, {reg13} peningas if you can defeat {reg3} opponents, and {reg14} peningas if you can survive long enough to beat {reg4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last {reg59?fighter:man} standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {reg15} peningas. Sounds good, eh?

Some of the wealthy townsmen offer prizes for those fighters who show great skill in the fights. If you can beat {reg1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {reg11} peningas. You'll get {reg12} peningas for striking down at least {reg2} opponents, {reg13} peningas if you can defeat {reg3} opponents, and {reg14} peningas if you can survive long enough to beat {reg4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last {reg59?fighter:man} standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {reg15} peningas. Sounds good, eh?
Posso participar também?
Ha ha. You would have to be out of your mind not to. Of course. The melee fights are open to all. Actually, there is going to be a fight soon. You can go and hop in if you want to.
Olá. Você parece nov{o/a} por aqui. Qual seu nome?
Eu sou {playername}.
Well met, {playername}. I am the master of the tournaments here at {s1}. Talk to me if you want to join the fights.

Ha-ha, that's quite the bruise you're sporting, but don't worry. Everybody gets trounced once in awhile. The important thing is to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and keep fighting. That's what champions do.
Hey, you managed to take down {reg8} opponents. Not bad, but that won't bring you any prize money. Now, if I were you, I would go back there and show everyone what I can do...
You put up quite a good fight there. Good moves. You definitely show promise. And you earned a prize of {reg10} peningas for knocking down {reg8} opponents.
That was a good fight you put up there. You managed to take down no less than {reg8} opponents. And of course, you earned a prize money of {reg10} peningas.

Your performance was amazing! You are without doubt a very skilled fighter. Not everyone can knock down {reg8} people in the fights. Of course, you deserve a prize with that performance: {reg10} peningas. Nice, eh?
That was damned good fighting, {playername}. You have very good moves, excellent tactics. And you earned a prize of {reg10} peningas for knocking down {reg8} opponents.

Congratulations champion! Your fight there was something to remember! You managed to be the last fighter standing beating down everyone else. And of course, you won the grand prize of the fights: {reg10} peningas.
Hello, {playername}. Good to see you again.
O que gostaria de fazer?
Sobre as lutas...
Haverá algum torneio em cidades perto daqui em breve?
Preciso partir agora. Adeus.
{reg2?Não haverá torneios tão cedo.:{reg1?Torneios serão organizados em {s15}.:Um torneio será organizado em {s15}.}
Haverá uma batalha aqui logo. Você pode participar se quiser.
Bom. É isso que vou fazer.
Thanks, but I will give my bruises some time to heal.
Good {reg59?girl:man}. That's clever of you.
Na verdade, pode me falar sobre as recompensas novamente?
Hello, {reg59?girl:boy}. If you have any prisoners, I will be happy to buy them from you.
Then you'd better bring your purse. I have prisoners to sell.
Not this time. Farewell.
Deixe-me ver o que você tem...
When you take more prisoners, bring them to me. I pay well.
Você não terá nada de mim além de aço frio, escória.
Não há necessidade de lutar. Estou posso pagar para passar.
Silver without blood, that's our favourite kind! Hmm, having a look at you, I reckon you could easily come up with {reg5} peningas. Pay it, and we'll let you be on your way.
Muito bem, tome.
Não tenho tanto dinheiro comigo.
That's too bad. I guess we'll just have to sell you into slavery. Take {reg59?her:him}, lads!

Ei, eu ouvi falar de você! Você massacrou nós, os irmãos livres, como cães, e agora espera que eu o deixe ir por algumas moedas fedorentas? Pode esquecer. Você não deu nenhuma chance para nós, e vai receber chance alguma agora.
Heh. Não foi tão difícil, não é? Tudo bem. Vá agora.
Eh? O que foi?
Time to hand over that big purse of yours, isn't it?
Sua sorte acabou, desgraçado. Prepare-se para morrer!
Why wouldn't you hand over yours, scum?
Do you know whom you are talking to? I will not kill you if you join me.
I care very little who you are. It's time for you to die.
Yes, I've heard of you. They say your men get the best loot. Forgive us, and we will be delighted to join such a fierce leader.
We would consider your offer if you added {reg0} peningas to it.
Peningas come to me more easily than quality fighters do. Welcome to my army.
Não tenho dinheiro suficiente...
Now I know why they call you bandits. Never mind.
And I for my part welcome such doughty men!
On second thought, I want fighters more loyal to me than the spoils. Never mind.
Huh. I've always fancied being called 'Killer.' Time to make me a new name.
Here's my second thought: eat my steel!
Esqueça, não tenho assuntos com você.
Você quer que a gente o siga?
Sim. Vamos cavalgar juntos.
Não. Não dessa vez.
Unfortunately, you do not have room in your party for us.
Estamos as suas ordens.
Você não vai me capturar. Não dessa vez.
Você não tem chance contra mim. Desista.
Eu vou desistir quando você estiver morto!
I beg you! Please leave us alone.
Você acha que pode fugir de mim? Será meu prisioneiro ou morrerá!
Very well, we'll leave you in peace this time. Do not oppose us again.
Haven't you got any mercy? Well, we will fight you to the last man!
Hmmm. Ten peningas for each looter makes {reg1} peningas for all {reg0} of them.
Let me see. You've brought {reg0} bandits, so 20 peningas for each comes up to {reg1} peningas.
Well, well, you've captured {reg0} brigands. Each one is worth 30 peningas, so I'll give you {reg1} for them in total.
Acho que isso é tudo, então.
Yes, {reg59?Lady:Lord} {s1}?
{s1}, redeem yourself in the eyes of Odin, and rid yourself of that Christian weakling God!
{s1}, repent of your sins and accept the one true Lord, our saviour, Jesus Christ!
Wonderful news, you're free to go!
On the second thought, maybe you should stay my prisoner
Whatever suits you!
I will not forget this act of Honor!
You will remain my prisoner until one of your relatives reimburses me for you.
Truly, this is beneath you.
I trust you will be as understanding when I hunt you down like the dog you are!
I will set you free if you allow me to court your {s11}, {s33}.
I suppose I can live with that.
I think you are plain crazy to offer me something like that!
I see you have some fine armor and weapons in good condition...
Yes, and what is it to you?
Nothing, just admiring.
Perhaps, it's time to share it with someone needy.
Eh?
I'd like to try on your {s13}.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
Nothing, just joking.
Hah! I think you are thinking of having fun at my expense.
I am not joking. Remove your {s13} and hand it over to me!
You are nothing but a common thief, {playername}. I will always remember this!
Hey, you!
I will set you and the rest of your lot free, if you attack my enemies.
Do not try running away or trying something stupid. I am watching you.
I can't stand the sight of you! Die!
It could be the mead talking, but today I really feel like setting you free.
Oh, thank you, your Highness.  God bless you!
I would like to offer you a place in my shield wall.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}. I swear on my mothers grave I will serve you, my {reg59?lady:lord}!
It would be best if your highness just let me go home, I'm not interested.
I see...
In my shield wall, we are all treated as equals.  I expect your obedience and also your trust.
I will obey your wishes, my {reg59?lady:lord}.  I swear!
Sorry, but I really don't have space for you at the moment.
Excellent news.
Não, eu juro que não farei nada disso.

Hmm, let me take a look... Your {s7} is {s8}. I think I will be able to make it {s9} for {reg1} peningas. {s10}

Eu procuro por um homem com o nome de {s4}. Me foi dito que ele se esconde por aqui.

Have you seen any {s22}-playing guards around here?
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. Haven't heard or seen anyone like that, but if he is hiding here, you might be able to find him if you look around.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. Me and my friends were listening to the sounds of a {s22} the other day, but I don't recall that person. Perhaps he's left already?
I am looking for someone who may or may not be a ghost.
A ghost? Hah! Ghosts don't appear during the day! Try finding him at night!
A ghost? Ghosts don't appear on their own! You need to walk by him to wake him up.
Pff... Que tipo de baboseira é essa?

She lives on the wharf, {reg59?madam:sir}, where she trades in goods brought by merchants. It is one of the tall houses there.

Disaster has struck my family, {reg59?madam:sir}. We have no land of our own, and the others have no money to pay for our labor, or even to help us. My poor children lie at home hungry and sick. I don't know what we'll do.
My life is miserable, {reg59?madam:sir}. I haven't been able to find a job for months, and my poor children go to bed hungry each night. My neighbours are too poor themselves to help me.
Then take these 300 peningas. I hope this will help you and your family.
Then clearly, you must travel somewhere else or learn another trade.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}. I will do as you say.
{reg59?My good lady:My lord}, you are so good and generous. I will tell everyone how you helped us.
Thank you for your kindness, {reg59?madam:sir}. With your help, our lives will be better. I will pray for you every day.
Times are hard, {reg59?madam:sir}. We work hard all day, yet we go to sleep hungry most nights.
Times are hard, {reg59?madam:sir}, but we must count our blessings.
We are not doing too badly, {reg59?madam:sir}. We must count our blessings.

Not much to tell. I am the ninth child of Caliacas, the smallest. My father is more of an influential man than a rich one. He gave me two options: join you or enter the monastery. Honestly, I'd rather fight and have the opportunity to get rich than be locked up behind stone walls, so I did not think long! And here I am!
Nada. Continue.
Você não tem chance contra nós. Renda-se ou iremos matar todos vocês.
Nós vamos lutar até o fim!
Não ataque! Nós nos rendemos.
O que você quer?
Renda-se ou morra!
Nada. Nós deixaremos você em paz.
You should go ask at Doccinga. The village is quite near. You need to talk to Thonkrik.
Deus sozinho nos deu a vitória.
Estou feliz em ver que também está vivo.

Yes, yes... Now, a couple of my boys have the watch captain pinned down in a back room with a knife at his throat. I'll need to go drag him before {s5} and explain what this breach of the peace is all about. You don't need to be part of that, though. I'll tell you what -- if all goes well, I'll meet you in the mead hall again shortly and let you know how it all came out. If you don't see me in the mead hall but instead see my head on a spike over the city gate, I'll assume you know enough to stay out of town for a while and forget this whole episode ever happened. So -- hopefully we'll meet again!
Who are you? How did I get here? Where am I?
My head hurts! I do not remember anything since I fell overboard from the boat.

You have been close to death, unconscious for two weeks. Doccinga fishermen found you near the coast, clinging to a plank. You were barely breathing, and your body was covered with wounds. They brought you here so that I would heal you.
Doccinga? Then I am in Friese! Are you the old sorcerer, the man who can cure all diseases?
I've heard enough. I will go to Doccinga and ask them about the other passengers. Farewell.

No. One man only could claim such fame. People from around the world came in search of cures at his door. They were so numerous that came up the trails to Doccinga! But that man died a year ago. I am Aebbe, his son, a simple healer.
A year ago, you say? Damn, I've lost everything! This trip has been for nothing!
I've heard enough. I will go to Doccinga and ask them about the other passengers. Farewell.
Many, like you, have been here since the death of my father, leaving everything for the promise of a cure that I cannot give them. I'm sorry, but the skills of my father died with him.
Do you know if the fishermen found more people? Maybe my mother is still alive...
I need to talk to the fishermen and ask them about the other Woden Ric passengers. Farewell.
They brought only you here. I don't know more. You should go ask in Doccinga. The village is near. You need to talk to Thonkrik.
Well, aren't you impatient! You should go and ask in Doccinga. The village is near. You need to talk to Thonkrik.
Very good, healer. I'll talk to Thonkrik from Doccinga. Farewell.
{s1} is near here. Good luck, foreigner. Thonkrik is a good man. He will help you.
Renda-se ou morra. Faça sua escolha.
Não tenho medo de você. Eu vou lutar.
Do you know who you are talking to? I will not kill you if you join me.
I care very little about who you are. It's time for you to die.
I care very little who you are. It's time for you to die.
